author: ehillenius
msg: fixed detaching was potentially done more than once in a request cycle, which would be a problem when people would override
detach, which was unfortunately possible as we didn't make that method final. I made that method final now, as it is
pretty dangerous to override that method and have it called more than once. As an alternative - for those people that were
using an overridden detach method, I put in onDetach (and onAttach for the sake of being consistent). That method should be
rarely need to be overriden if ever - I stated that in the javadocs too - but might come in handy now and then.

author: ehillenius
msg: fixes for extra space before /> in form's hidden field

author: ehillenius
msg: implemented the notion of a default submit button
